metadata.title: CVE-2021-41867 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in OnionShare 2.3 before 2.4 allows remote unauthenticated attackers to retrieve the full list of participants of a non-public OnionShare node via the --chat feature.

criterions.comment: onionshare package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
